channel.title: Design on Flying blind - coding nonsense
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Flying blind - coding nonsense

item.title: PaintCode, the mindblowing tool
item.description: There are several fantastic tools, I will write some of them later. I would like to start with PaintCode. Drawing simple shapes (e.g. ovals, rectangles, etc) can be easy, but complex shape drawings are very tedious. This ugly app we will build today. I would like to draw this origami bird, and add to our app in two different way. One way is to use Custom View and draw method, while the other is Image View using image method.
